sentences.en: Each constituency will return only one legislator.
sentences.cn: 每一选区只能有一位“立委”。

sentences.en: Which countries have the largest number of people per legislator?
sentences.cn: 哪些国家的议员代表最多数的人？

sentences.en: His ads direct listeners to a website run by David Duke, a white supremacist and former Republican legislator.
sentences.cn: 他的广告将听众引向了一个由大卫·杜克运行的网站，杜克是一个白人至上主义者，同时也是前共和党立议员。
